author: PR.com
title: A Night at the Sands - A Vegas Musical Cocktail with an L.A. Twist
text:
A Night at the Sands - A Vegas Musical Cocktail with an L.A. Twist
Gas up and dig the smooth sounds of the Rat Pack in this modern infused cabaret that blends songs of past and present.
Los Angeles, CA, October 08, 2015 --( PR.com )-- From the company that brought you ChicabaRENT and Thenardiers Inn, Hollywood Fringe 2015 Best of Cabaret Award Winner.
Creating Arts Studios is proud to present A Night at the Sands, a 360-degree immersive theatrical cabaret running for six weeks, November 13 – December 19, 2015 from 8:00PM- 10:00PM at The Sayers Club, 1645 Wilcox Ave., Los Angeles, CA 90028.
Upon arrival guests are greeted by showgirls and bunnies and swept back in time to the Sands Hotel Casino, where they are entertained with songs, dance and casino “action” all while watching the band warm-up for the boys.
Swing on into the Sands, gas up and dig the smooth sounds of the Rat Pack in this modern infused cabaret that blends songs of past and present. Become a part of the action as the Casino is hit and the boys have to prove they had nothing to do with it. Descend into the sex, power and styling of old-school Vegas in this original, fictional tribute to legends of entertainment that is an immersive, interactive experience.
The professional cast brings Broadway style singing and dancing to life with Hollywood style humor in this original one of a kind show.
Tickets are $40 and can be purchased online at http://www.cacstudios.com/anightatthesands/ Seating is general admission, for this intimate yet rambunctious event, and every seat is in on the action. VIP reserved seats are available.
Doors open at 7:00PM for live music, pre-show entertainment and drinks, show starts promptly at 8:00pm.
Creating Arts Studios is a non-profit artistic studio for live theatrical performances, recordings and original works.
For more information about The Experiment please visit http://www.cacstudios.com/anightatthesands/
